   941	#------------------- PREPARAÇÃO: Cache pnpm (requer root) ----------------------
   942	run_quiet "Preparando diretório cache pnpm..." "mkdir -p /mnt/pnpm-cache && chown deploy:deploy /mnt/pnpm-cache && chmod 775 /mnt/pnpm-cache"
   943	
   944	#------------------- ETAPA 15: Backend deps/build ------------------------------
   945	run_quiet "$(t installing) backend deps..." "sudo -H -u deploy bash -lc '
   946	  set -Eeuo pipefail
   947	  export PNPM_HOME=\$HOME/.local/share/pnpm
   948	  export PATH=\"\$PNPM_HOME:\$PATH\"
   949	  export PUPPETEER_SKIP_DOWNLOAD=true
   950	  export PNPM_STORE_DIR=/mnt/pnpm-cache
   951	  BACKEND_DIR=\"/home/deploy/${empresa}/backend\"
   952	  cd \"\$BACKEND_DIR\"
   953	
   954	  HEALTHY_CACHE=1
   955	  if [ ! -d node_modules ] || [ ! -f node_modules/.modules.yaml ]; then
   956	    HEALTHY_CACHE=0
   957	    printf \"[WARN] PNPM cache ausente ou corrompido; reconstruindo dependências.\\n\"
   958	  fi
   959	
   960	  if [ \"\$HEALTHY_CACHE\" = 1 ]; then
   961	    printf \"[INFO] Validando dependências existentes com pnpm --prefer-offline.\\n\"
   962	  fi
   963	
   964	  if ! pnpm install --frozen-lockfile --prefer-offline; then
   965	    printf \"[WARN] Falha na validação pnpm; limpando node_modules e repetindo.\\n\"
   966	    rm -rf node_modules
   967	    pnpm install --frozen-lockfile
   968	  fi
   969	'"
   970	
   971	run_quiet "$(t installing) backend build..." "sudo -H -u deploy bash -lc '
   972	  set -Eeuo pipefail
   973	  export PNPM_HOME=\$HOME/.local/share/pnpm
   974	  export PATH=\"\$PNPM_HOME:\$PATH\"
   975	  BACKEND_DIR=\"/home/deploy/${empresa}/backend\"
   976	  cd \"\$BACKEND_DIR\"
   977	
   978	  calc_backend_hash() {
   979	    local -a paths=()
   980	    local item
   981	    for item in package.json pnpm-lock.yaml tsconfig.json tsconfig.build.json src; do
   982	      if [ -e \"\$item\" ]; then
   983	        paths+=(\"\$item\")
   984	      fi
   985	    done
   986	    if [ \"\${#paths[@]}\" -eq 0 ]; then
   987	      echo \"0\"
   988	      return
   989	    fi
   990	    find \"\${paths[@]}\" -type f -print0 2>/dev/null | LC_ALL=C sort -z | xargs -0 sha256sum 2>/dev/null | sha256sum | awk '{print \$1}'
   991	  }
   992	
   993	  FINGERPRINT_FILE=.chatia_backend_build.fingerprint
   994	  CURRENT_HASH=\$(calc_backend_hash)
   995	  NEED_BUILD=0
   996	
   997	  if [ ! -f \"\$FINGERPRINT_FILE\" ]; then
   998	    NEED_BUILD=1
   999	    printf \"[INFO] Fingerprint inexistente; build inicial necessária.\\n\"
  1000	  else
  1001	    PREVIOUS_HASH=\$(cat \"\$FINGERPRINT_FILE\" 2>/dev/null || true)
  1002	    if [ \"\$CURRENT_HASH\" != \"\$PREVIOUS_HASH\" ]; then
  1003	      NEED_BUILD=1
  1004	      printf \"[INFO] Alterações detectadas no backend (hash atualizado).\\n\"
  1005	    fi
  1006	  fi
  1007	
  1008	  if [ ! -d dist ] || [ -z \"\$(find dist -type f -print -quit 2>/dev/null)\" ]; then
  1009	    NEED_BUILD=1
  1010	    printf \"[WARN] Diretório dist ausente ou vazio; build será executada.\\n\"
  1011	  fi
  1012	
  1013	  if [ \"\$NEED_BUILD\" = 0 ]; then
  1014	    printf \"[INFO] Build backend reutilizada; nenhuma ação necessária.\\n\"
  1015	  else
  1016	    pnpm run build
  1017	    printf \"%s\" \"\$CURRENT_HASH\" > \"\$FINGERPRINT_FILE\"
  1018	    printf \"[INFO] Fingerprint backend atualizado para %s.\\n\" \"\$CURRENT_HASH\"
  1019	  fi
  1020	'"
  1021	
  1022	save_checkpoint "ETAPA_15_BACKEND_INSTALADO"
  1023	
  1024	#------------------- ETAPA 16: Migrações ---------------------------------------
  1025	run_quiet "$(t configuring) database (migrations/seeds)..." "bash -lc '
  1026	  set -Eeuo pipefail
  1027	  BACKEND_DIR=\"/home/deploy/${empresa}/backend\"
  1028	  DIST_DIR=\"\$BACKEND_DIR/dist\"
  1029	  MIGRATIONS_DIR=\"\$DIST_DIR/database/migrations\"
  1030	  SEEDS_DIR=\"\$DIST_DIR/database/seeds\"
  1031	  DB_NAME=\"${empresa}\"
  1032	  SEED_SENTINEL=\"\$BACKEND_DIR/.chatia_backend_seeds.fingerprint\"
  1033	
  1034	  DEPLOY_BASE=\"cd \\\"\$BACKEND_DIR\\\"; export PNPM_HOME=\\\$HOME/.local/share/pnpm; export PATH=\\\"\\\$PNPM_HOME:\\\\\$PATH\\\"; export SEQUELIZE_POOL_MAX=10; export SEQUELIZE_POOL_MIN=5;\"
  1035	
  1036	  migrations_pending=0
  1037	  pending_labels=\"\"
  1038	  SQL_CHECK_META=\"SELECT 1 FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema='\''public'\'' AND table_name='\''SequelizeMeta'\'' LIMIT 1;\"
  1039	  HAS_META=\$(sudo -u postgres psql -At -d \"\$DB_NAME\" -c \"\$SQL_CHECK_META\" 2>/dev/null | head -n 1 || true)
  1040	  APPLIED_LIST=\"\"
  1041	  if [ \"\$HAS_META\" = \"1\" ]; then
  1042	    APPLIED_LIST=\$(sudo -u postgres psql -At -d \"\$DB_NAME\" -c \"SELECT name FROM \\\"SequelizeMeta\\\" ORDER BY name;\" 2>/dev/null || true)
  1043	  fi
  1044	
  1045	  if [ -d \"\$MIGRATIONS_DIR\" ]; then
  1046	    while IFS= read -r file; do
  1047	      if [ -n \"\$file\" ] && ! printf \"%s\\n\" \"\$APPLIED_LIST\" | grep -Fxq \"\$file\"; then
  1048	        migrations_pending=1
  1049	        pending_labels=\"\$pending_labels \$file\"
  1050	      fi
  1051	    done < <(find \"\$MIGRATIONS_DIR\" -maxdepth 1 -type f -name \"*.js\" -printf \"%f\\n\" 2>/dev/null | LC_ALL=C sort)
  1052	
  1053	    if [ \"\$migrations_pending\" = 1 ]; then
  1054	      printf \"[INFO] Migrations pendentes detectadas:%s\\n\" \"\$pending_labels\"
  1055	      sudo -H -u deploy bash -lc \"\$DEPLOY_BASE ./node_modules/.bin/sequelize db:migrate\"
  1056	    else
  1057	      printf \"[INFO] Nenhuma migration pendente; pulando db:migrate.\\n\"
  1058	    fi
  1059	  else
  1060	    printf \"[INFO] Diretório de migrations não encontrado; pulando db:migrate.\\n\"
  1061	  fi
  1062	
  1063	  calc_seed_hash() {
  1064	    local dir=\"\$1\"
  1065	    if [ ! -d \"\$dir\" ]; then
  1066	      echo \"0\"
  1067	      return

  1071	      return
  1072	    fi
  1073	    find \"\$dir\" -type f -name \"*.js\" -print0 2>/dev/null | LC_ALL=C sort -z | xargs -0 sha256sum 2>/dev/null | sha256sum | awk '{print \$1}'
  1074	  }
  1075	
  1076	  SEED_HASH=\$(calc_seed_hash \"\$SEEDS_DIR\")
  1077	  SEED_PREV=\"\"
  1078	  if [ -f \"\$SEED_SENTINEL\" ]; then

  1080	  fi
  1081

  1084	  elif [ \"\$SEED_HASH\" = \"\$SEED_PREV\" ]; then
  1085	    printf \"[INFO] Seeds já aplicados anteriormente (fingerprint inalterado).\\n\"
  1086	  else

Tuned `instalador.sh` Etapas 15–22 to reuse caches, skip redundant work, and leave a clearer narrative in `scripts/chatia-install.log`. Key updates:
- `instalador.sh:944-1021` now validates existing backend `pnpm` modules, rebuilds only when the source fingerprint changes, and records reuse decisions for Etapa 15.
- `instalador.sh:1025-1109` guards Etapa 16 by inspecting `SequelizeMeta`, fingerprinting compiled seeds, and updating the company name only when the DB value drifts.
- `instalador.sh:1113-1168` keeps the frontend `.env` pair in sync via temp+cmp and reuses PNPM stores for Etapa 18 with prefer-offline installs.
- `instalador.sh:1171-1343` reuses backend/frontend build artifacts through SHA sentinels, mounts-aware cache cleanup, and PM2 reloads with `startOrReload` plus conditional `pm2 save`.
- `instalador.sh:1346-1513` writes Nginx configs only on diff, reloads instead of restart, skips certbot when the chain is still fresh, and makes the cron script + entry idempotent.

Tests: `bash -n instalador.sh`

1. Run `shellcheck instalador.sh` when available to catch quoting/style regressions.
2. Execute `sudo ./instalador.sh | tee scripts/chatia-install.log` on a clean host and on an already-provisioned host to confirm the new skip paths behave as expected.
